item.description:
We live on the northshore and it's not easily accessible by T. There is a bus that runs once an hour from Wonderland Station if you're that intrepid!

We are a household with birds and a rabbit for those who may have allergies to fur, feathers, aspen shavings, and/or hay dust. The birds will be in a different room but the rabbit will NOT.  She probably won't be running around but she WILL be in the living room.

There is on street parking available and maybe even a fireworks show. Our neighbors up the street usually have a big fireworks display every year on July 4th but that's a Monday, so they may move it to this day, who knows.

If you'd like to bring a snack to share, that would be much appreciated but not required.  We will have some dinner items available.  If it's not enough we are close to several restaurants with reasonably priced food.

End time for this is Sunday, 11:30 pm.  Unfortunately, Josh and Kieran function poorly without sleep so this will not be an all nighter.

Address will be emailed to those attending as of Saturday.
item.name: Play games at Josh and Kieran's House
